item.title: The story behind my backgammon project
item.author: Author
item.description: So since I was a kid I have a close friend who loves backgammon. Every summer we were meeting in my hometown and played. However, during the winters we were in different cities so we could not meet to play instead we were using services like dod games. The problem was that dod enforces strict time limits and is kind of annoying because we cannot even take a break and we have to limit our play time.
